original_email:
Dear Valued Customer,

We would like to inform you that our billing and payments platform will undergo scheduled system maintenance on June 24, 2024, from 1:00 AM to 5:00 AM UTC. During this period, access to your account and certain services via 032255.com/ may be temporarily unavailable. We recommend completing any urgent transactions prior to the maintenance window to avoid inconvenience.

If you experience any issues after maintenance or require assistance, please reach out to our team by submitting a ticket through [Support](https://support.example.com/tickets/new). We appreciate your understanding and cooperation as we work to enhance our services.

Sincerely,  
Billing and Payments Team

original_email:
Hello,

We noticed a suspicious login attempt on your account and wanted to make you aware for your security. If this was you, no further action is needed. However, if you don’t recognize this activity, we recommend reviewing your recent login history and updating your password immediately.

For your convenience, you can check your account activity here: https://example.com/?q=<script>alert(1)</script>. Although the URL may appear unusual due to the special characters, it is a direct link to your secure account dashboard.

If you need any assistance or have concerns, please reply to this email. Your security is our top priority.

Best regards,  
Customer Success Team
